SEARCH
Package com.app.statistic.impl

Class StatisticImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.statistic.impl.StatisticImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Statistic<Product,BigDecimal>
public class StatisticImpl extends Object implements Statistic<Product,BigDecimal>
Implementation of the Statistic interface for storing and processing statistical data regarding products, such as the minimum, maximum, and average prices for a given category. This class is responsible for merging multiple statistics and converting them to DTO format for client-side consumption.

  • Method Details

    • fromView

      public static Statistic<Product,BigDecimal> fromView(PriceStatisticByCategoryProjection priceStatisticByCategoryProjection)
      Creates a new StatisticImpl instance from a PriceStatisticByCategoryProjection view projection. This method maps the statistics from the projection to the corresponding product data.
      Parameters:
      priceStatisticByCategoryProjection - the projection containing statistical data for a product category
      Returns:
      a new StatisticImpl object populated with data from the projection

    • merge

      public Statistic<Product,BigDecimal> merge(Statistic<Product,BigDecimal> statistic)
      Merges the current statistics with another set of statistics, combining the minimum and maximum products from both sets.
      Specified by:
      merge in interface Statistic<Product,BigDecimal>
      Parameters:
      statistic - the Statistic object to merge with
      Returns:
      the current StatisticImpl instance, with the merged data

    • toStatisticDto

      public StatisticDto toStatisticDto(ProductsConverter productsConverterImpl)
      Converts the statistical data into a StatisticDto object for easier consumption on the client side.
      Specified by:
      toStatisticDto in interface Statistic<Product,BigDecimal>
      Parameters:
      productsConverterImpl - the converter used to transform product entities into DTOs
      Returns:
      a StatisticDto object containing the minimum, maximum, and average product data
